description: Updates the configuration of an existing endpoint for a model from Amazon Bedrock Marketplace.

parameters.name: endpointArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint you want to update.

parameters.name: endpointConfig
parameters.description: The new configuration for the endpoint, including the number and type of instances to use. sageMaker (dict) --- The configuration specific to Amazon SageMaker for the endpoint. The number of Amazon EC2 compute instances to deploy for initial endpoint creation. The Amazon EC2 compute instance type to deploy for hosting the model. The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon SageMaker can assume to access model artifacts and docker image for deployment on Amazon EC2 compute instances or for batch transform jobs. kmsEncryptionKey (string) --- The Amazon Web Services KMS key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the Amazon EC2 compute instance that hosts the endpoint. vpc (dict) --- The VPC configuration for the endpoint. An array of IDs for each subnet in the VPC to use. (string) --- An array of IDs for each security group in the VPC to use. (string) ---

nested_params.name: sageMaker
nested_params.description: The configuration specific to Amazon SageMaker for the endpoint.

nested_params.name: initialInstanceCount
nested_params.description: The number of Amazon EC2 compute instances to deploy for initial endpoint creation.

nested_params.name: instanceType
nested_params.description: The Amazon EC2 compute instance type to deploy for hosting the model.

nested_params.name: executionRole
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon SageMaker can assume to access model artifacts and docker image for deployment on Amazon EC2 compute instances or for batch transform jobs.

nested_params.name: kmsEncryptionKey
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the Amazon EC2 compute instance that hosts the endpoint.

nested_params.name: vpc
nested_params.description: The VPC configuration for the endpoint.

nested_params.name: subnetIds
nested_params.description: An array of IDs for each subnet in the VPC to use.

nested_params.name: securityGroupIds
nested_params.description: An array of IDs for each security group in the VPC to use.

parameters.name: clientRequestToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This token is listed as not required because Amazon Web Services SDKs automatically generate it for you and set this parameter. If you're not using the Amazon Web Services SDK or the CLI, you must provide this token or the action will fail. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: endpointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: modelSourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ARN of the model from Amazon Bedrock Marketplace that is deployed on this endpoint.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The overall status of the endpoint in Amazon Bedrock Marketplace (e.g., ACTIVE, INACTIVE).

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: Additional information about the overall status, if available.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the endpoint was registered.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the endpoint was last updated.

nested_items.name: endpointConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of the endpoint, including the number and type of instances used.

nested_items.name: sageMaker
nested_items.description: The configuration specific to Amazon SageMaker for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: initialInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon EC2 compute instances to deploy for initial endpoint creation.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 compute instance type to deploy for hosting the model.

nested_items.name: executionRole
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon SageMaker can assume to access model artifacts and docker image for deployment on Amazon EC2 compute instances or for batch transform jobs.

nested_items.name: kmsEncryptionKey
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the Amazon EC2 compute instance that hosts the endpoint.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: An array of IDs for each subnet in the VPC to use.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: An array of IDs for each security group in the VPC to use.

nested_items.name: endpointStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the endpoint (e.g., Creating, InService, Updating, Failed).

nested_items.name: endpointStatusMessage
nested_items.description: Additional information about the endpoint status, if available.
